memoria_instrucoes[0] <= 32'b00000000000000000000000000000000; // NOTHING
memoria_instrucoes[1] <= 32'b01101000000000000000000000000000;  // .0 <- 0
memoria_instrucoes[2] <= 32'b01000000000000000000000000000000;  // output .0
memoria_instrucoes[3] <= 32'b01101000010000000000000000000001;  // .1 <- 1
memoria_instrucoes[4] <= 32'b01000000010100000000000000000000;  // output .1
	
memoria_instrucoes[5] <= 32'b00001000100000100000000000000000;  // .2 = .1 + .0
memoria_instrucoes[6] <= 32'b01000000101000000000000000000000;  // output .2
	
memoria_instrucoes[7] <= 32'b00010000000000100000000000000000;  // .0 = .1 + 0
memoria_instrucoes[8] <= 32'b01000000000000000000000000000000;  // output .0
	
memoria_instrucoes[9] <= 32'b00010000010001000000000000000000;  // .1 = .2 + 0
memoria_instrucoes[10] <= 32'b01000000010100000000000000000000;  // output .1
	
memoria_instrucoes[11] <= 32'b01010000000000000000000000000101;  // jump to 5
memoria_instrucoes[12] <= 32'b11111000000000000000000000000000;  // stop
